attributes.action: Make every day of the week a weekend
attributes.background: Make it so dont go to school at all

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to end all state-funded education, and requirements for children to attend schools, or do something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
